goals.title: Shadow Ruler
goals.description: Your faction aims to control the city from the shadows. Amass 100 Influence and 60 People before the game ends

goals.title: Civilian Hero
goals.description: You're building a public campaign rooted in generosity and trust. By round 6, secure 90 Money to fund your factionâ€™s social rise.

goals.title: Civilian Hero
goals.description: Your movement is people-powered. By round 6, rally 90 People under your cause to prove your influence on the streets.

goals.title: The Vault Keeper
goals.description: Your faction seeks stability through wealth. End the game holding at least 90 Money. Enough to buy safety, favors, or silence.

goals.title: Protector of the Masses
goals.description: The people see you as a shield in unstable times. Secure 95 Money by round 6 to finance programs and keep the streets on your side

goals.title: Money Mogul
goals.description: Power comes from both coin and charisma. End the game with over 80 Money and at least 40 Influence to dominate the boardroom and backroom alike.

goals.title: Money Mogul
goals.description: You rise as a leader with deep support and sway. End the game with more than 80 People and at least 40 Influence to control the masses.
